info.title: Article Rating by Social Virality
info.description:
If you want to analyze your article's social virality around the world, then this is for you. To find an article's rating, the API takes input of the article URL and gives output in the form of JSON response. It gives the following metrics as response:

Facebook likes, 
Facebook shares,
Facebook comments,
Google plus +1s,
LinkedIn shares,
Pinterest count,
Twitter tweet count,
StumbleUpon views and 
Total count of above all

For any doubts you can contact me at kakumanivrn@gmail.com

get.description: You give URL of an article/post and it gives you the stats for it in social

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Requires URL of an article to calculate social virality metrics.
